parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns a list of button names assigned to the given user action. You can find the action names in config class ControllerSchemes or [[:Category:Key Actions|user action names]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''actionKeysNames''' userAction

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''actionKeysNames''' [userAction, maxKeys, inputDevicePriority]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]] - maximum number of keys to return

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> inputDevicePriority: [[String]] - result sorted by inputDevicePriority with values: <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.35.127928</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>
* <tt>"Mouse"</tt>
* <tt>"Keyboard"</tt>
* <tt>"Stick"</tt>
* <tt>"Gamepad"</tt>
* <tt>"Tracker"</tt>
* <tt>"Combo"</tt> (mouse and keyboard combinations)
* <tt>"Controler"<template><title>sic</title></template></tt> (any controller other than mouse or keyboard)
Other values are considered as: 
* <tt>"Unsorted"</tt>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_list = [[actionKeysNames]] "ReloadMagazine"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"R"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[actionKeys]], [[actionKeysImages]], [[actionKeysNamesArray]], [[actionName]], [[inputAction]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 20:14, 20 January 2010 (CET) </dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:WGL.Q|kju]]</dt>
<dd class="note">The return type is a stacked string. A string inside a string. To compare use first single and inside double quotes:<br>
<code>[[if]] ([[actionKeysNames]] "User1" == '"W"') [[then]] { ... };</code>
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
